Package group8

Class JsonRequest

java.lang.Object
group8.JsonRequest
public class JsonRequest extends Object
Parses GitHub webhook push events which are JSON into native java object using Gson dependency. The structure of class represents the layout of the received json data. To parse the webhook json data use the readJsonFromRequest method or readJsonFromString method. Additionally, the API exposes functions to retrieve relevant necessary data.
Author:
Atheer Salim

      the branch name of the webhook request
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the webhook push event was made on a tag

    • readJsonFromRequest

      public static JsonRequest readJsonFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException
      Takes in the request that was made to the server and converts the HTTP body assumed to be in JSON format into the JsonRequest object.
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request made to the server
      Returns:
      JsonRequest the native java object of the json request
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readJsonFromString

      protected static JsonRequest readJsonFromString(String json)
      Takes in the JSON data in string format, assumed to be valid and converts it into the JsonRequest object.
      Parameters:
      json - the json data
      Returns:
      JsonRequest the native java object of the json request
